original_text: And Sarah conceived and bore Abraham a son in his old age at the time of which God had spoken to him.
korean_text: 사라가 임신하고 하나님이 말씀하신 시기가 되어 노년의 아브라함에게 아들을 낳으니

sentences.original_text: and bore Abraham a son in his old age
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 늙은 나이에 아브라함에게 아들을 낳았으니

sentences.original_text: at the time of which God had spoken to him.
